page.title: 19LEGENDS
page.content: The girl said, that in the land where she came from everything was green even the sky.She said that she and her brother had followed the sound of bells into a cave and after a long time they had found themselves at the bottom of the wolfpits and staring at them were strange pink men.The girl wanted to go home but she couldn't because she could not find the entrance to the cave,although she tried very hard. After along time the girl learned the ways of the villagers and lost most of her green colour.She married and moved away but some say she can still be seen searching for the entrance to the cave which would lead her home. There are many stories like this all over the world but this one did happen and you can read about it in our church.
